title: Universe/Frames/AxesParameterizedEuler
description: Configuration for AxesParameterizedEuler axes in frames plugin

angles.description: Z-X-Z Euler rotation angle sequence (evaluables, possibly parameterized)

h.description: grid spacing for 5-point stencil used to compute time derivatives of the angles (time units)

partials.description: If you know that the Euler angles evaluables have no non-zero partial derivatives wrt to tracked parameters, you can set this to false for optimisation
